quotes.title: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.title: A hangover suggests a great night, jet lag suggests a great adventure
quotes.author: Lao TzuJ.D. Andrews

quotes.title: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.title: I am not the same, having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.title: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.title: There’s a sunrise and a sunset every single day, and they’re absolutely free. Don’t miss so many of them
quotes.author: Jo Walton

quotes.title: Fear is only temporary. Regrets last forever
quotes.author: Unknown
